description: Try our easy to follow Aromatic Pork Belly Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Aromatic Pork Belly Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750g pork belly, cut into bite-size pieces
2 tsp fresh ginger root, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a heavy skillet and add the pork. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until browned, remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.

Add the remaining oil to the pan and add the curry leaves, cumin, coriander, onion, garlic, and ginger. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, then return the pork to the pan with the curry powder. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes more.
Stir in the vinegar, cinnamon, star anise, cardamom, and coconut milk and measured water. Season and bring to a boil.
Cover tightly and cook in a preheated oven at 140°C for 2 1/2 hours or until the pork is tender. Serve with crusty bread or rice.
